description_en: This data use limitation indicates that use is allowed for general research use for any research purpose.
This data use limitation indicates that use is allowed provided it is related to the specified disease.

value_en: health or medical or biomedical research
description_en: This data use limitation indicates that use is allowed for health/medical/biomedical purposes; does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.
description_code: health or medical or biomedical research

description_en: This data use limitation indicates that use of the data is limited to the study of population origins or ancestry.
This data use limitation indicates that use is limited to genetic studies only (i.e., no phenotype-only research)
This data use limitation indicates that use includes methods development research(e.g., development of software or algorithms) only within the bounds of other use limitations.
This data use limitation indicates there is no restriction on use.
This data use limitation indicates that use is limited to studies of a certain research type.
This data use limitation indicates that use is limited to research purposes (e.g., does not include its use in clinical care).
This requirement indicates that the requestor must agree to collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
This requirement indicates that the requestor must provide documentation of local IRB/ERB approval.
This should be coupled with an ontology term describing the geographical location the restriction applies to.
This requirement indicates that use is limited to use within an approved institution.
This requirement indicates that use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations and not-for-profit use, non-commercial use.
This requirement indicates that use is limited to use within an approved project.
This requirement indicates that requestor agrees not to publish results of studies until a specific date.
This requirement indicates that requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
This requirement indicates that the requestor must return derived/enriched data to the database/resource.
This requirement indicates that use is approved for a specific number of months.
This requirement indicates that use is limited to use by approved users.
An investigation concerning specific age categories.
An investigation concerning ancestry or population origins.
An investigation concerning health, medical, or biomedical research.
Biomedical research research concerning specific disease/s
Biomedical research concerning drug development.
Biomedical research concerning genetics (i.e., the study of genes, genetic variations and heredity).
An investigation concerning specific gender categories.
An investigation concerning development of methods, algorithms, software or analytical tools.
An investigation concerning a specific population group.
An investigation concerning use of data as reference or control material.
